PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06142021-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC,  , 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Prohibition of Entry into Canada from any Country Other than the United States)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (PROHIBITION OF ENTRY INTO CANADA FROM ANY COUNTRY OTHER THAN THE UNITED STATES) in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) continue to prohibit entry into Canada of foreign nationals arriving from countries other than the United States, with some limited exceptions, and if they have reasonable grounds to suspect they have COVID-19, if they have signs and symptoms of COVID-19, or if they know they have COVID-19; (3) allow any person approved as a permanent resident under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act to enter Canada; (4) continue to maintain the requirements from the previous Order; and (5) extend the restrictions on entry into Canada until July 21, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
